title: Personal Driver
details: I need a personal driver to help me with my family's transportation. The driver needs to have a license and have some sort of experience in diving.

title: Housekeeper
details: I need a housekeeper to help my mother in the house. The housekeeper needs to have 2 years of experience at least.

title: Trainer
details: I need a personal trainer to help me with my fitness workouts. The trainer needs to have a license and have some sort of experience in training.

title: Babysitter
details: I need a babysitter to take care of my child while I'm out. The babysitter needs to have a license and have some sort of experience in dealing with children, and should be patient and kind.

title: Guard
details: I need a guard to look after my building which still under construction during the night. The guard should be honest and sincere, and have a strong body to stop thieves.
